headline: Baker Hughes Targets Energy Storage And Low Carbon Ammonia Growth
summary: Baker Hughes (NasdaqGS:BKR) expanded its partnership with Hydrostor through a technology and equity agreement focused on advanced compressed air energy storage in the U.S. and Australia. The company agreed to supply equipment and solutions for one of the first low carbon ammonia fertilizer plants in the U.S., developed by Wabash Valley Resources. For you as an investor, these moves show how Baker Hughes is leaning further into energy transition projects while still drawing on its core...
